meanings.sent1: She enjoys retwisting her hair to create new styles.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, he spent hours retwisting the fallen branches to clear the path.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved retwisting a rope to make it disappear.
meanings.sent4: The plot of the movie kept retwisting, surprising the audience at every turn.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's graceful movements resembled the retwisting of a delicate ribbon.

meanings.sent1: The retwisting of the rope made it stronger and more secure.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the retwisting of the yarn in the handmade scarf.
meanings.sent3: The retwisting of the plot in the story kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent4: The retwisting of the river's path caused flooding in the nearby town.
meanings.sent5: The retwisting of the vines in the jungle created a natural maze.
